channel.title: Need help

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Create a new variable for the amount of the item they receive and go to the process and change 1 to the variable you created, then you could use…

if (itemUsed == 35340 && usedWith == 1249) {//Dragon Plate
    player.RunecraftingGet = 995;
    player.yourNewVariable = 16700000;
    player.RunecraftingID = 1121;
}

Please also read about Java conventions.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

Im making a “Money Well” in a 508, the idea is when you use a item on it, you get money for it and lose the item (like high alching)
I got this for the Dragon Platebody (started there)

if (itemUsed == 35340 && usedWith == 1249) {//Dragon Plate player.RunecraftingGet = 995, 16700000; player.RunecraftingID = 1121; }
But i get an error if i do that.
But i don’t get an error when i use this:

if (itemUsed == 35340 && usedWith == 1249) {//Dragon Plate player.RunecraftingGet = 995; player.RunecraftingID = 1121; }
But then people only get one coin…
[u]How can i fix that?

-Klomp3

Read full topic
